18768326.Line7.136591: I will flee no longer. I'm going back in for Osric. If it costs me my life, well... I owe that much and more.

413058B5.VoiceDir9.136591: relieved that the hero has offered to join. feeling a little hopeful

4552EC11.Line11.136591: I used to be a Knight. You probably figured that out already. I left the day I rescued Suna. I should have saved more.

676F2FA2.Line3.136591: If I had killed him instead of fleeing the city, these people might still live.

8EEB85E0.Line1.136591: This is Osric's doing. I watched him butcher innocents in Caldeum, and instead of stopping him, I walked away.

DF21B1AD.VoiceDir1.136591: Edgar talking through his difficult decision to return to Caldeum and face Osric.

F0FA2CE8.Line9.136591: Very well. Let us deliver justice together.
